body.name: JISULIFE Portable Handheld Fan, Mini Rechargeable Hand Fan, Small Battery Operated 14-21hrs, Personal USB Foldable Fan, Pocket Fan with Power Bank, Flashlight, Gifts for Women/Girls/Friends - Blue
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 51 mins
features: Super Long Endurance and Strong Airflow - Adopted the advanced technology, it lasts for 14 hours with 2-speed, 21 hours with 1-speed after about 3 hours full charge. The maximum rotating speed of the fan is 3400 rpm which is enough for personal use to keep you cool.

Foldable Design and Mini Size - The foldable design makes it easy to carry and store. Besides, with the oval shape(1.3*1.3*4.7 Inches, Weight: 4.4 Oz), this rechargeable fan can hide the fan blade, small and easy to slide into your pocket and purse.

Power Bank Function and Quiet Operation - 5V/1A USB output port makes the mini hand fan to be a power bank(2000mAh) in an emergency, supplying power for mobile phone, MP3, etc. With no frame design, make the noise low to 50db that causes no bother during work.

Flashlight and Include Wrist String - Long press the power button to open the flashlight feature when the fan is not spinning. The flashlight is quite bright and can be used in dark areas or if electricity is out. And with a lanyard included, you can hang it on your hands or travel backpack.

USB Fast Charge & Gifts Choice - You can use a wall charger, laptop, power bank to charge it. And the handheld fan only needs 2-3 hours to get fully charged. This mini handheld fan will also be a gift for your family, friends. This is also an ideal summer gift for men women mom dad kids girls boys mother's day father's day.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1. How to open the cover? There is a small gap on the top between the cover and the main body. You can pry it for your finger. Or, you can press the base where the USB connectors are and the main body on the top is exposed, and then pull it out. 2. How to open the flashlight? Long press the button for 2-3s, and the light will work. 3. For Hard to through the lanyard. You can use a pin or other tiny thing to assist you to push the lanyard through. 4. How to store the product? It is recommended to get the fan fully charged before storing when not in use, especially when stored in different seasons, so as to ensure that they can still be used in the next summer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: It’s a cute and functional fan. I love that it’s rechargeable, a flashlight and power bank. It has a good weight to it so it doesn’t feel cheaply made. The fan has two speeds which is nice. Although the strap was a bit hard to put on it’s not impossible I just put a thin string through the hole and looped the strap and back out the same hole I put it in to pull it through. They had a nice selection of colors to choose from and I look forward to buying the rest as a gift for my family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars God send in Mexico
reviews.reviewText: Anyway, I love this little fan. I actually have two. It is a little on the tricky side to open because you need to get your fingernail in the dent to open it. It's not hard, and won't break your nails, but it might take one or two tries when you first get it. The fan moves just the right amount of air and is not loud at all. It was close to 90 in Mexico and the air felt so good on my face. It wasn't weak and it wasn't too strong. I will definitely be bringing this with me on future trips. My husband likes it to. I also like that it doubles as a charger and flashlight. I am a fan of anything that reduces the number of things I have to carry around when I am on an excursion or at a theme park.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars SO happy to have one - others copy me!
reviews.reviewText: I keep this little fan in my purse and whenever I'm somewhere that's uncomfortably warm, I pull this out and it makes SUCH a difference! Enough people have noticed that I've sent them the link and they've since ordered their own. Battery life lasts a long time -as promised. It's small enough that most people hardly notice if I set it up next to my laptop. If the room is silent, you can hear the fun running, which makes me self-conscious. But if the room has people talking or some sort of noise, you really don't notice the sound of the fan. It's a little hard to open, and I've actually hurt myself trying to figure out how to both shove and pull at the same time to open it. Sometimes it can be unstable when set up on a tabletop. If you bump it, it's easy to knock over and then turn off on it's on.**It does very little to help with cooling outside. You have to hold it about 2 inches from your face to even feel the air moving. Inside, however, it works great!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good fan just a little noisy
reviews.reviewText: It’s not overtly loud but if you use it in public it does draw stares. The charge is good and flashlight is good. It’s slightly large and bulky.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy compact fan with long battery life
reviews.reviewText: I bought this with the intention of bringing it to WDW for a trip later this summer and wanted to check it out before then. It was quick to charge and I love the compact design - easy to throw in my bag and have it ready to go. Opening it the first time took me a second until I realized you could just push on where the ports are and it toggles enough to swing open completely - an easy method to get it open when it looks otherwise pretty sealed tight! The two speeds are nice to have (tho I tend to keep it on the higher one), and it is very quiet for the amount of oomf this thing puts out. I haven't used it as a battery for my phone yet but I appreciate that it can be a backup power pack if I should ever need one. Wish it came in black for my spooky vibes aesthetic, but that's just me ;) Overall, using this at a local renfaire and while traveling (it was a godsend in a warm airport terminal recently), this is a handy little fan that can provide some swift relief. I think it'll be perfect for the WDW trip later this year!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The perfect fan for those hot summer days both inside and outside. I didn't think I would ever use the flashlight but it comes in handy. Super quiet and easy to fold up for on the go. Battery life is long. It sits upright as well. The wristband is a nice touch. The only downside is the safety aspect of the blades. If you touch them at all it really hurts. Don't even think about getting your hair caught in them. Overall a great fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s portable, works just fine and I love that it can serve as a power bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the fan but it's noisy.

I have had this item for awhile now and have taken it across the globe. Works fantastic, different speeds are a bonus. I am very clumsy and despite dropping it several times on hard stones and in the Sahara sands, it still works like new! The wrist strap is reccomended and came in handy when taking things extreme. Also, I love how compact it is and fits nicely in your hand without being obnoxious.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Worked a dream, easy to charge, realised it also acts as a torch and a charger too. Saves your hand if you’ve used a Spanish fan you’ll know what I mean. Great gift, even the kids enjoyed using it

reviews.reviewTitle: Todo el mundo ha flipado con las funcionalidades
reviews.reviewText: Ventilador, linterna y power bank a un precio increíble

He tenido otros ventiladores portátiles mas potentes pero más grandes.Este es increíblemente portátil y con muy buena potencia. El hecho de tener además la opción de linterna y de poder usarse como batería externa le dan un plus.Muy recomendable para llevar encima.

Ventilateur de poche, très pratique, peut se transporter facilement. Efficace si il est positionné proche soi. Le niveau de bruit est raisonnable. La fonction torche lumière est un peu superflue, mais pourrait être utile, on ne sait jamais. L'ouverture du boitier est pas très pratique, on ose pas forcer avec l'ongle pour l'ouvrir en deux, mais on s'y fait. La dragonne qui permet de l'avoir au poignet n'est pas simple à mettre, j'avoue ne pas avoir insisté pour la mettre. Bon produit.
